message:
Interview update for [Job position]

Dear {{doc.applicant_name}},

I would like to thank you for your time during the interview. We really enjoyed meeting you. 

Your profile was taken forward to the next level of the interview process. Your interview was scheduled on [date] around [time].

Thirvu Soft Private Limited
2B, Bushido Towers, Nava India Road, Sowripalayam Village, Peelamedu, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu 641028
Plus code : 2X9V+RH Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu
Kindly confirm your invitation acceptance via mail.


Thanks and Regards,
Myvizhi Palanisamy
HR Manager
Thirvu Soft Private Limited
